source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_SEQ_00<tab>This lonesome lass needs an adventurer with courage.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_SEQ_00<tab>アラギリの寂しげな美女は、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and slay the stray gazelle for its horn.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA71301 /var>で見渡し、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2188801 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DAA01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the gazelle horn to the lonesome lass.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_TODO_01<tab>寂しげな美女に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DAA01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_000<tab>By the look of those strange garments, I take it you're an adventurer? If you've a little time to spare, I could sure use your help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_000あなた、冒険者よね？
時間があるなら、手伝ってほしいことがあるの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_001<tab>I was hoping to make a charm for a friend of mine, and I desperately need the horn of a gazelle. They're not easy to come by here in Ala Ghiri, and I could never hunt one on my own. For an adventurer like yourself, I bet it'd be as easy as kicking rocks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_001大事な友達にお守りを作りたいんだけど、
それには、丈夫でしなやかなが必要でね。
私は狩りなんてできないし、代わりに獲ってきてもらいたいの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_002<tab>Normally you'd need to travel pretty far to even find a gazelles, but I've heard a stray was spotted near Miriam's Luck.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_002は、この辺りにはいないから、
諦めてたんだけど、解放軍の人たちが話してるのを聞いたの。
辺境地帯へと続く道に、1匹迷い込んだのがいるってね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_003<tab>I don't have much, but I'll gladly pay you for its horns if you can find it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_003そのあたりで見渡して、「」を探してみて。
そいつから、「」を手に入れてほしいの。
報酬は出すから、お願いね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_004<tab>The officers said they spotted a gazelle near Miriam's luck. I pray it's still there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_004辺境地帯へと続く道で見渡して、「」を探してみて。
そいつから、「」を手に入れてほしいの。
報酬は出すから、お願いね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_010<tab>Was it true? Was there really a gazelle up there?
target: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DAA01 /var>」は、獲ってきてくれたかしら？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_011<tab>Oh, this is wonderful. Thank you! She's going to love the charm I make with this.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_011まあ、とても立派な角だわ。
これなら、力強いお守りが作れそうね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_012<tab>They say the horns of the gazelle are a symbol of strength, you know. She'll need it where she's headed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_012大きな角は、力の象徴なのよ。
災いは外へ、幸いは内へ。
もうすぐこの地を離れる彼女を、きっと守ってくれるわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_013<tab>With Ala Ghiri finally liberated from the Garleans, she intends to move to Ul'dah and start a business.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_013あの子は、この街が解放されたのを機に、
ウルダハに渡って、商売を始めるんですって。
そんな彼女のことを、心から尊敬して、応援しているのよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_014<tab>I could never do something so bold. After everything we've been through, the world seems like such a scary place. If fate should curse me to be taken by the Garleans again, I'd...I'd...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_014私には……外に飛び出す勇気がないの。
辛い思いもたくさんしたけど、それにも慣れてしまったから。
もう一度、あんな気持ちを味わうくらいなら……ここで……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_015<tab>Never mind me. She's always been the brave one, and I know she'll be fine. Still, I'll feel better knowing she has my charm with her.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ804_02832_FLOWERVENDOR02832_000_015彼女には、私の代わりに、ウルダハで幸せになってほしい。
そんな想いをこめて、これを贈りたかったの。
ありがとう、冒険者さん。
